concept.title: Drag Objects into a Drawing
concept.shortdesc: If you want to link data and drawings to ZWCAD drawings from other applications, besides inserting OLE objects, you can drag the selected data or drawings into ZWCAD. Both applications must be running and visible on your screen. To drag information between applications, the other applications must support ActiveX. Objects dragged into a drawing are embedded, not linked.

conbody.p: As manipulating for cutting and pasting, you do the dragging in the same way. The information is removed from one document and pasted into the other document when you do the dragging. Holding down CTRL while dragging creates a copy of the information without affecting the original document, as you do copying and pasting in the same way.
